item.title: Excel table creation with Python [Progress management table]
item.description: #Introduction I thought about making a simple progress management table for myself. …Isn’t it a pain to make this every time? ? That’s why I wrote a code that creates a table when I start it after learning python. â†“ The result looks like this Now I will explain each part. File creation import openpyxl.utils import os from openpyxl.styles import PatternFill from openpyxl.styles.borders import Border, Side from openpyxl.formatting.rule import FormulaRule wb = openpyxl.
